text: The Simpsons: Skateboarding is a sports video game based on the animated television show The Simpsons. It was released for the PlayStation 2 in 2002. The game involves the different characters of the show taking part in a skateboarding contest across Springfield. Category:2002 video games Category:The Simpsons Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Skateboarding video games
title: The Simpsons Skateboarding
